artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: interior scene with Christ bound with ropes at LL; man on throne in back at R addressing Christ and his captors; one of the men next to Christ holds up a book

title: Christ before Annas
